sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个班的平均成绩很高。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège bān de píngjūn chéngjì hěn gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La moyenne de cette classe est très élevée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The average score of this class is very high.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'avion vole de manière stable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The plane flies very smoothly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège pǐnpái de pǐnzhì hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La qualité de cette marque est très bonne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The quality of this brand is very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La surface du lac est très calme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The lake surface is very calm.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǒu liánghǎo de xuéxí xíguàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a de bonnes habitudes d'étude.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has good study habits.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zuìjìn yǒu hěn duō fánnǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a beaucoup de soucis ces derniers temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has many worries recently.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa femme est médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His wife is a doctor.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nà jiā gōngsī yǐjīng pòchǎn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette entreprise a déjà fait faillite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: That company has already gone bankrupt.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les jeunes sont pleins d'énergie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Young people are full of energy.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a un besoin urgent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has an urgent need.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ wénjiàn chuánzhēn gěi wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez me faxer le document.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please fax the document to me.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il habite toujours à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He still lives in Beijing.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个任务的期限是下周一。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège rènwu de qīxiàn shì xià zhōuyī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La date limite de cette tâche est lundi prochain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The deadline for this task is next Monday.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'attends ta réponse avec impatience.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I look forward to your reply.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Pendant les vacances, les magasins sont fermés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: During the holidays, the stores are closed.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'examen de mi-semestre aura lieu la semaine prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The midterm exam will be held next week.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 心脏是人体重要的器官。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xīnzàng shì réntǐ zhòngyào de qìguān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le cœur est un organe important du corps humain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The heart is an important organ of the human body.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le prix de l'essence a encore augmenté.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The gasoline price has risen again.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zài yī jiā dà qǐyè gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il travaille dans une grande entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He works in a large enterprise.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les enfants aiment boire des sodas.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Children like to drink soda.
